name: Apartment in Westlake Hanoi
address: 151 Thuy Khue Street Tay Ho District, Ba Dinh District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Located 1.4 km from One Pillar Pagoda in Hanoi, this air-conditioned apartment features a garden with an outdoor pool. Guests benefit from balcony and a barbecue. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property.

An oven, a microwave and a fridge can be found in the kitchen. A flat-screen TV is provided. Other facilities at Apartment in Westlake Hanoi include a fitness centre.

You can play tennis at the property, and the area is popular for hiking. Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum is 1.5 km from Apartment in Westlake Hanoi, while West Lake is 1.5 km from the property. Noi Bai International Airport is 19 km away.

places.name: Benh Vien Lao Va Cac Benh Phoi Trung Uong
